main.name: James Seagram
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio website.  Thank you so much for visiting
main.bio: Front-end engineer with back-end knowledge and experience using react and node.js to create web applications.  Lover of all things outdoors.  Continually learning, willing to learn any technology stack if it can be used to create/improve a project.  Curious about technology and where we are heading.
main.contactmessage: I would love to get in contact with you.  Please fill out the form below to send me a message.

resume.skillmessage: Web development technology: HTML5, Javascript, Java, CSS, ReactJs, nodeJs, express, Apex, Lightning Web Components

education.description: Knowledge of financial markets, investment strategy, and the practical application of economic theories and analysis. My experience at UM was one of the best times of my life. Go Griz!

work.title: AIM Salesforce Consultant Trainee
work.description: Completed training program with areas of focus in Business Essentials, Consulting, Systems Analysis and Design, Data Analytics, Project Management, Information Infrastructures and programmatic extension of the Salesforce Platform using Apex and the Lightning Web Component framework.  Focus on cloud and IT basics with an emphasis on the Salesforce Platform.

work.title: Senior Investment Specialist
work.description: I began as a contract employee, ranking at the top of my class for three consecutive months until I was offered a full-time position at one of the worlds leading global asset management companies.  I educated our retail investors in making better decisions to achieve their investment goals.  Obtained series 6 and SIE.

projects.title: OMBD Movies and Videogames Database
projects.category: A React app that utilizes the OMDB open API, and vanilla CSS.

projects.title: HouseKeeper
projects.category: A full-stack MERN application, utilizing Materializecss and React's Context API for state management.  Track your house activity, add house members, other pages in the work.

projects.title: Crypto Currency Dashboard
projects.category: A crypto currency dashboard React app displaying my three favorite coins, newsfeed on the side, trading signal included.

projects.title: Nasa Astronomy Picture of the Day
projects.category: A React based website that fetches Nasa's APOD with an explanation of the video or picture.
